Name: Whispers of the Waves
Description: Eri, a self-proclaimed member of the Pioneer Association, comes to the cafe and asks for your help in recovering the memories scattered in the Irideglow…
QuestDesc: Eri, a self-proclaimed member of the Pioneer Association, comes to the cafe and asks for your help in recovering the memories scattered in the Irideglow…

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome back, Passenger! Perfect timing! Someone came here looking for you. Said it's something important.

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! What a happy occasion!

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nope, a new face! Oh, this calls for a celebration!

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks to you and Chisa breaking Honami's loop, Shashou Cafe finally has a new visitor. Who knows, this cafe might just hum with life again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She said she's from the Pioneer Association. She seemed... troubled by a "membership appraisal."

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We chatted. She asked about nice spots for pictures. I suggested the fountain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The cherry blossoms there are in full bloom. They won the vote for... "Honami Crossing's Most Scenic Spot"!

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh-huh. Whenever that came up, things got a bit heavy…

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Too complicated. Not for a capybara like me. It's best you ask her yourself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Namipon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The cafe needs me, so I'll leave you to it, Passenger.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Right. To the fountain it is.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi, I'm Eri from the Pioneer Association. Finally, we meet!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (A Left Behind, but doesn't seem local. Where did she come from?)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (...Unusual. Better figure out her intentions first.)

Options.PlotLineKey: Namipon said you were looking for me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, yes! The "Dark Legend of Justice"! Please, I have a request for you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! I recognized you immediately.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're the "Mysterious Scissorswoman's" partner. The black-haired hero, Honami's newest urban legend!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not just that you're strong enough to fight the TDs. It's why you do it. People can see you're genuinely trying to protect this city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C'mon, legends need cool titles. It's part of the appeal!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, the real reason I sought you out is because I need your help with a project. I want to photograph Honami City.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This isn't just for fun. It's for my membership appraisal. I call myself a member of the Pioneer Association, but I'm technically still pending membership review.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've been a huge fan of Wutherium Geographic magazine since I was a kid. Joining the Pioneer Association as an editor? That's the dream.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the Editorial Board has a crazy appraisal process. You have to pitch a project that aligns with the Association's mission, pull off a photoshoot, secure approval, and get it published.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I finally chose my theme, but now the streets are blocked, TDs are popping up everywhere, and my Terminal decided to die on me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was totally out of options until I started hearing about your heroics... Please, you have to help me! This is my one shot!

Options.PlotLineKey: And the reward for all this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, Dark Legend of Justice! Don't worry, I won't let you work for free!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, don't worry. I'm not about to let a legendary hero work for free!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's get started then. Please, take a photo of this fountain at its absolute best.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place... it used to be so full of life. You could see tired shoppers stopping by, listening to the water, stealing a moment of peace.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like Shashou Cafe, this fountain became a landmark in Honami Crossing. It's a memory... the feeling of being perfectly content.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The lighting, the framing, the timing… perfect. Just perfect!

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seeking out your help couldn't have been more right. Thank you! And of course, I have Namipon to thank for introducing us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Honami's mascot always brings luck. Wherever Namipon goes, good things follow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Eri
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, it's only fitting that our next stop has a whole lot more Namipons!
